**FAQ**  
**Where can I find a test IP and test file?** Please send an email to admin@armorshark.com with heading "Test IP" or "Test File" and you'll receive a response shortly.

**When will my VPS be setup?** You'll receive your VPS details instantly after payment.  

**How can I pay?** You can pay via Paypal or credit card. We are considering accepting Dwolla payments; send an email to admin@armorshark.com if this payment method interests you.  

**How long have you guys been in business?** Armorshark, LLC has been in business since May 2010. We are registered in Virginia.  

**What support methods are available?** We offer live chat, Skype, and ticket support.  

**What are your nodes built on?** Our nodes use Intel Ivy Bridge E1245v2 CPUs, DDR3 ECC RAM, and enterprise Samsung and Intel SSDs (e.g. Cherry 520).  

**What can I use my VPS for?** Check our [Acceptable Usage Policy](http://www.armorshark.com/clients/knowledgebase.php?action=displayarticle&id=34) for the full run-down. Essentially, we allow most any activity that is legal under US law.

**What operating system are available?** See the list here.  

**Do you provide backups?** Yes, each node is backed up weekly to an offsite storage cluster.  

**How do I contact you with pre-sales questions?** Send in an email to sales@armorshark.com or use the live-chat feature on our website.  

**What is your refund policy?** We offer a 3-day refund policy.   

**About Us**  
We are a registered LLC in the state of Virginia. Armorshark, LLC currently operates a corporate VPN network, a public VPN service (TigerVPNS.com with our custom-coded Android application), and a VPS hosting service. Our goal is to provide affordable and sustainable high-performance VPS for anyone who wants the speed of SSD arrays at a fraction of the price.
